rules.name: block-git-commit-no-verify
rules.reason: --no-verify is not allowed. Fix the commit to pass all checks.

rules.name: block-git-stash
rules.reason: Stashing changes is not allowed. Please commit or discard your changes before stashing. If a commit hook is preventing the commit, either fix whatever is preventing the commit or fail out and let the human know why.

rules.name: block-git-push-no-verify
rules.reason: --no-verify is not allowed. Fix the push to pass all checks.
